title: IStructureSystemSplitMember.GetSplitReferenceObjectTypes
description: Gets the types of split member references.
returns: Array of types of split member references as defined by swSelectType_e : swSelFACES swSelDATUMPLANES swSelADVSTRUCTMEMBER
remarks:
This method is valid only if
IStructureSystemSplitMember::MemberType
is set to
swStructureSplitMemberType_e
.swStructureSplitMember_Reference.
The array returned by this method maps one-to-one and onto with the array returned by
IStructureSystemSplitMember::GetSplitReferences
.
